price: 90. Sidaan ugu soo dejinnayba kala qaybiyaashii (Yuhuudda iyo Nasaarada)*.
footnotes: *Fiiro gaar ah: tafsiir kale waa sidaan ugu soo dejinay Cadaab kuwii isu dhaarsaday  dhibka xaqa iyo diiddadi oo loola jeedo mushrikiintii Carbeed.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
